content:
What app version are you observing the issue on? From my tests, the issue only seems present on beta 16 releases. The v14 release doesn't exhibit the issue.

I believe your observations and the github bug reported below are the same root issue. https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/issues/10243

I'd recommend you please add your observations to the github ticket.
creator: platform34

content: Thank you for your feedback. I didn't know the GitHub Bug Report page before. I will post it there. And yes. Im using 16.0b3
creator: matthias.scheid2
